title: Pixel 3 is getting too hot, (while driving and using Waze , with or without charging)
content:
I keep getting the msg "phone is getting too hot..." 
This is happening while using Waze with or without charging.

Had this issue with Pixel 1,
Didn't happen with Pixel 2
Now again with my Pixel 3...

The screen is way too hot to touch.

Not happy with this...
